attributes.action: issue Free prescriptions for people with Crohns Disease and Colitis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems unfair that people with a chronic disability such as Crohns or Colitis have to pay for ongoing medical prescriptions just to remain pain free and manage their symptoms. It can be extremely expensive to purchase these prescriptions many people need multiple items each month. We didnpt ask for this condition !
